channel.title: Wolpertinger scroll not working :/

item.title: Wolpertinger scroll not working :/
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

I’m trying to add the wolpertinger scrolls to my server, although they don’t seem to be working properly.

This is my code.

case 6870: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastScroll > 60000 && c.lastsummon == 6870 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(12437, 1)) { c.lastScroll = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.sendMessage("You sacrifice a scroll to boost your magic."); c.getItems().deleteItem(12437, 1); c.gfx0(247); c.playerLevel[6] = (int)(c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6])*1.25); } else { c.sendMessage("You need to have a magic focus scroll and have waited,"); c.sendMessage("atleast 1 minute since your last attempt to use this scroll."); } break;

Read full topic
